name: Light keeper (Abfelgames)
description:
This is my entry for the BenBonk game jam 4.

You play as a ghost who is scared of the dark and you have to ignite the floor to light the room up. You get matches from a big magic matchbox  in the middle of the room.

But the matchbox is scared of you so it runs away.

If your sanity reaches zero you lose the game and if survive till the morning (1 min), you win.

Controls:

WASD - move

Left click - light match

This game was made entirely in python so dont expect anything great due to the low performance python provides...

Just under 600 lines of code...

Credit to pixabay for the sound effects: https://pixabay.com/

Music by YVHNII from Pixabay
